title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: The group dialog is not being shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
OB: When attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset, an error is shown. As part of the template requirements, the user expects the UI to not perform validation and therefore, the group dialog should still be shown.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set, allowing the user to create a new table group.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add a table report item
2. Do not set the dataset
3. Try creating a new table group
